page.title: 08WILCOX AND SONS 3
page.content: {We liked Mr Wilcox. }He was very friendly and showed us everything, even though we had only gone to see if he would help us. He is{very {progressive}and tries to be right up to date. He is proud of the quality of his work, and is{prepared to work {very hard. }He and his men will work 7 days aweek if they have to, and are quite prepared to work 15 hours a day to get their orders filled. Most of his men were out fitting equipment in a saw-mill when we went, but the ones who were there were very nice to us. They answered all our questions and showed us their machines. It was very surprising to find such an {up-to-date firm}in really old buildings in a little village like Holme Lacy.
